definition: to cut out (as a dress)/to cut/to trim/to reduce/to diminish/to cut back (e.g. on staff)/decision/judgment

sentences.english: Fissile Material Cut-off Treaty (FMCT) will contribute to nuclear weapons non-proliferation and nuclear disarmament.
sentences.chinese: “禁產條約”有利於防止核武器擴散，促進核裁軍。

sentences.english: U. S. Senate ratifies nuke arms treaty with Russia.
sentences.chinese: 美國參議院批准與俄羅斯簽署核裁軍條約。

sentences.english: Nuclear disarmament and nuclear non-proliferation is a major of the meeting agenda.
sentences.chinese: 核裁軍和核不擴散是本次會議的一大議題。

sentences.english: Nuclear disarmament and nonproliferation are mutually dependent.
sentences.chinese: 核裁軍與核不擴散相輔相成。
